lyro.optionsTippy: A Lyro AI conversation is a customer interaction that has at least one reply from our Al support agent.
lyro.benefitTippy: Annual savings assuming an average _CURRENCY_42k annual salary of a CS rep in US and Lyro AI's average response rate of 55%. The assumed cost of a human agent answering one conversation is _CURRENCY_6.73.

features.text: Win your audience with relevant offers

flows.optionsTippy: Visitors reached with Flows are unique users who received automated messages from Flows.
flows.benefitTippy: Average uplift in conversion rates among all of our customers using Flows

topBoxes.lyroAiDescription: Solve up to 67% of customer problems with Lyro - the AI agent. Automatically answer common questions and perform recurring tasks so your team can focus on growing your business.
topBoxes.flowsDescription: Increase conversions by 26% with contextual Flows. Boost your lead gen and sales funnels with Flows - no-code conversion paths that trigger at crucial moments in the customer journey.

calculator.customerSupportDescription: __VARIABLE__ and __VARIABLE__ handled by your team make up your monthly billable conversations limit
calculator.liveConversationsDescription: A real-time chat between a visitor and your team, managed in the Inbox. Great for instant support and quick responses.
calculator.ticketsDescription: An asynchronous conversation created in your helpdesk. Any email sent to your connected inbox automatically becomes a ticket in Tidio. Tickets can also be created from the offline widget, by Lyro, or manually by your team.
calculator.iWantCustomerService: I want _NUMBER_ billable conversations per month
calculator.iWantLyro: I want _NUMBER_ Lyro AI conversations per month
calculator.iWantFlows: I want to reach _NUMBER_ visitors per month
calculator.lyroAiAgentDescription: Conversational AI trained with your content. Lyro responds instantly to FAQs, completes tasks like order tracking or ticket creation, and can smoothly hand off to human agents when needed
calculator.salesFlowsDescription: Automated, no-code chat flows that engage visitors and answer common questions directly in the chat widget. Designed to boost conversions and save you time.
calculator.customQuotaIsAvailableOn: Custom quota is available on Plus and Premium plans. For more than __VARIABLE__ billable conversations, __VARIABLE__ Lyro AI conversations and __VARIABLE__ visitors reached with Flows, please contact us for a custom plan.

faq.question: What is a Conversation?
What is a “Billable conversation”?
Will I pay for unwanted conversations?
faq.analyticsLabel: Will I pay for unwanted conversations?
faq.answer: No. A conversation is only billed as a Billable conversation once you reply using Tidio or proactively initiate a conversation with your visitor. If you don’t respond to a customer conversation – if it’s spam or simply a message that doesn’t require a reply – the conversation won’t count toward your monthly limit.

faq.question: Will I pay for multiple messages within one conversation?
faq.analyticsLabel: Will I pay for multiple messages within one conversation?
faq.answer: A conversation that receives a response by a human agent or is initiated by a human agent will only be counted as one Billable conversation regardless of how many messages are sent or received on the thread.

faq.question: How does the free trial work?
faq.analyticsLabel: How does the free trial work?

faq.question: Can I change my subscription anytime I want?
faq.analyticsLabel: Can I change my subscription anytime I want?

faq.question: Can I add Tidio live chat to more than one website/store?
faq.analyticsLabel: Can I add Tidio live chat to more than one website/store?

faq.question: Can I send live chat messages?
faq.analyticsLabel: Can I send live chat messages?
faq.answer: Yes. The Customer Service plans enable you to proactively engage your website visitors through the live chat widget.

faq.question: What is Lyro AI Agent?
What is a Lyro conversation?
Can I purchase Lyro AI Agent or Flows as a standalone product?
faq.analyticsLabel: Can I purchase Lyro AI Agent or Flows as a standalone product?
faq.answer: Yes, each of our three core products - Lyro AI Agent, Customer Service and Flows - can be purchased individually or as part of a bundled plan in any configuration. This means you can choose to buy only the Lyro AI product or Flows and still benefit from the free limit of human conversations included in all subscriptions.

faq.question: How can I use Flows?
What’s the difference between Flows and Lyro AI Agent?
faq.analyticsLabel: What’s the difference between Flows and Lyro AI Agent?
faq.answer:
**Flows**

* Can be used as a marketing automation tool that converts visitors into paying customers or boosts their order value
* Perfect for answering simple, pre-defined questions.
* Require manual configuration
* Are triggered by specific actions and can proactively engage users
* Follow user-defined rules and scripts to answer customer questions
* Available only on Tidio


**Lyro AI Agent**

* AI-powered support chatbot that helps you solve up to 67% of customer problems
* Perfect for answering complex customer questions and automating repetitive tasks
* Learns from your support content and then uses artificial intelligence and natural language processing to understand questions and provide the appropriate answer.
* Understands the intent behind customer questions and uses solely your support content to generate personalized responses.
* Is not restricted to pre-defined questions. Lyro can answer complex questions in a human-like manner based on the information you feed it.
* Available on Tidio. Can also be integrated with other customer service tools


 Flows rely on pre-designed conversational paths while Lyro AI Agent uses artificial intelligence and natural language processing to understand questions and have human-like conversations with customers. Lyro provides more details to make sure customers are satisfied with the information they receive. On the other hand, Flows can be designed to convert visitors into buyers.
 
Keep in mind that you don’t have to choose between Lyro AI Agent and Flows. You can use both solutions at the same time to provide exceptional service to your customers.

faq.question: When will my Lyro conversation limit refresh?
faq.analyticsLabel: When will my Lyro conversation limit refresh?

faq.question: When will my Flows limit refresh?
faq.analyticsLabel: When will my Flows limit refresh?

faq.question: How does the ticketing system work?
faq.analyticsLabel: How does the ticketing system work?

faq.question: How many support agents can I add to my Tidio project?
faq.analyticsLabel: How many support agents can I add to my Tidio project?
faq.answer: You can add up to 10 agents on self-serve plans and custom numbers on the Plus package.

HandledConversations.description: "Billable conversation" refers to any live chat, ticket, email or social media channel conversation that includes a message from a human agent (you).

ActiveOperatorsLimitFeature.description: The maximum number of support agents who can use Tidio at the same time.

CustomerServiceLivechat.name: Live Chat
CustomerServiceLivechat.description: Provide answers, offer discounts, or make personalized recommendations through the live chat widget.

CustomerServiceTicketingSystem.name: Help Desk
CustomerServiceTicketingSystem.description: Improve your time to resolution and customer satisfaction with a smart ticketing system. Manage, assign, and reply to customers' requests in one place.

CustomerServiceEmailManagementSystemFeat.description: Connect your email inbox to manage your emails in your Tidio dashboard.

SocialMediaIntegrations.description: Manage your Instagram, WhatsApp, and Messenger DMs in a single dashboard.

CustomerServiceAnalyticsBasic.name: Basic analytics
CustomerServiceAnalyticsBasic.description: See basic data about your conversations, such as the number of missed conversations, first response times, and conversation duration.

CustomerServiceLiveVisitorsList.description: See all the visitors who are online on your website, along with the pages they're browsing so you can engage them through the chat widget.

CustomerServiceOperatingHours.name: Operating hours
CustomerServiceOperatingHours.description: Let customers know when you're online and collect their information when you're out of office.

CustomerServiceAnalyticsAdvanced.description: Get detailed insights on the number of sales generated with Tidio, customer satisfaction, and individual operator performance, and more.

GuaranteedResolution.name: Guaranteed 50% Lyro AI resolution rate
GuaranteedResolution.description: Achieve a guaranteed 50% resolution rate with Lyro AI for improved customer support efficiency. Resolution rate guarantee applies up to the fourth full calendar month after service commencement; available only to selected customers who qualify for Premium service; guarantee effective upon contract signature.

PriorityService.name: Priority Service + Premium Support
PriorityService.description: Let our Success Managers delight you with tailored service, immediate resolutions and enhanced assistance.

SuperAdminRole.name: Super admin role

AnalysisAndMonitoring.name: Analysis & monitoring

LyroAsManagedService.name: Lyro AI as a managed service
LyroAsManagedService.description: Tidio takes responsibility for the success of your AI Customer Service from you. You pay a fixed subscription and we successively reduce your customer support costs.

LyroTasks.description: Lyro AI Agent performs small automation tasks, such as creating tickets, checking order statuses, and more.

merge.text: Your first 100 visitors reached via Flows are free. You can upgrade your monthly limit to 2k - 100k.

AICopilot.name: Copilot
AICopilot.description: Copilot works natively in Tidio, offering on-brand reply suggestions from past conversations. It's also available as a Chrome extension for use in other helpdesk tools.

LiveChatAndTicketing.name: Live chat & Ticketing
LiveChatAndTicketing.description: Support customers in real time and asynchronously with live chat, email, video calls, and a ticketing system that improves resolution time and customer satisfaction.

LyroQuotaOneTime.name: 50 Lyro AI Agent conversations (one-time)
LyroQuotaOneTime.description: A Lyro AI Agent conversation is a customer interaction that has at least one reply from our AI support agent

PayPerLyroResolution.name: Pay-per-resolution billing
PayPerLyroResolution.description: You're billed only once a support conversation is fully resolved, maximizing ROI on your Premium plan.
